heading: Monday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Showers likely north; scattered early in the south, with thunder possible, then diminishing overnight Lows in the mid to upper 40s. Winds becoming south to southwest 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Clouds decreasing south in the morning. Scattered morning showers north, then clouds decreasing after noon, decreasing slowly northeast. Highs in the low to mid 60s in the south, and upper 50s to lower 60s north. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Fair early, then remaining partly cloudy west, with clouds increasing east. A rising chance of late-night showers, mainly east. Lows in the mid to upper 40s, some lower 40s far north. South winds 5 to 10 mph.
